show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Fractivism
content:
On Todayâ€™s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy... <!--more--> (www.healthjournalistblog.com and @alisonroselevy) speaks with David Braun, President of United for Action, http://unitedforaction.
org/ a leader in the fractivist coalition New Yorkers Against Fracking.
http://nyagainstfracking.
org/ We talk about Stop the Frack Attack, the July 28th rally in Washington, DC and upcoming actions.
